Sub KontaktDaten() Dim oTables as Object Dim vTable_Summen as Variant Dim vRows_Summen as Variant,oRecord_Kontakt as Object Dim sDocument_Typ as String Dim sName1 as String,sName2 as String,sName3 as String,sName4 as String,sNameKurz as String Dim sLand as String,sPLZ as String,sPlatzhalter as String Dim sOrt as String,sStrasse as String,sHausnummer as String,sTelefon as String,sKontakt as String Dim sFunktelefon as String,sFax as String,sEMail as String,sUrl as String,sKontakt_Bez as String Dim sBank as String,sBIC as String,sIBAN as String,sGeschaeftsfuehrer as String,sGeschaeftsfuehrer_Bez as String Dim sBankverbindung as String,sBankverbindung_Bez as String,sFirmendaten as String,iOptionInhaber as Integer Dim sAmtsgericht as String,sHRB as String,sUmsatzsteuernummer as String,sUmsatzsteuerID as String Dim sLogo_URL as String Dim sGrafik_URL as String,oGraphic as Object,oGraphic1 as Object,vCursor as Variant Dim sAnschrift_Eigen_1 as String,sAnschrift_Eigen_2 as String,sAnschrift_Eigen_3 as String Dim oStyleFamilies as Object,oPageStyles as Object,oPageStyle_1 as Object,oPageStyle_2 as Object Dim oBookmark As Object,oBookmarkAnchor as Object,oRangeCursor as Object Dim oSelections as Object,oSize as Object,vGraphics as Variant,iPrint_Logo as Integer Dim oTable_Logo1 as Object,oTable_Logo2 as Object,oCursorKopf1 as Object,oCursorKopf2 as Object Dim iCount as integer Dim sSQL1 as String Dim iPrint_Typ as Integer Dim lLogoHeight as Long,lLogoWidth as Long,lGrafikHeight as Long,lGrafikWidth as Long Dim sKundenName1 as String,sKundenName2 as String,sKundenName3 as String,sKundenName4 as String Dim SKundenVorname as String,sKundenLand as String,sKundenPLZ as String,sKundenOrt as String Dim sKundenStrasze as String,sKundenHausnummer as String Dim iOption1 as Integer,iOption2 as Integer,iOption3 as Integer,iOption4 as Integer Dim sMaterialaufschlag as String,sStundensatz as String
GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN") sSQL1="select distinct "&_ "t2.Name1,t2.Name2,t2.Name3,t2.Name4,t2.NameKurz,t2.Land,t2.PLZ,t2.Ort,t2.Strasse,t2.Hausnummer,t2.Telefon,t2.Funktelefon,t2.Fax,t2.EMail,"&_ "t2.Url,t2.Bank,t2.BIC,t2.IBAN,t2.Geschaeftsfuehrer,t2.OptionInhaber,t2.Amtsgericht,t2.HRB,t2.Umsatzsteuernummer,t2.UmsatzsteuerID,"&_ "t3.Logo_URL,t3.Grafik_URL,t3.LogoHeight,t3.LogoWidth,t3.GrafikHeight,t3.GrafikWidth,"&_ "t1.Suchstring,t4.Name1,t4.Name2,t4.Name3,t4.Name4,t4.Vorname,t4.Land,t4.PLZ,t4.Ort,t4.Strasse,t4.Hausnummer,"&_ "t1.Option_1,t1.Option_2,t1.Option_3,t1.Option_4,t1.Materialaufschlagsatz,t1.Stundenverrechnungssatz"&_ " from Steuerung as t1,Einstellungen as t2,Users as t3,"& sKunden &" as t4"&_ " where t1.ClientID = "& iClientID &_ " and t4.KontaktID = t1.KontaktID"&_ " and t2.EinstellungsID = "& iEinstellungsID_lokal &_ " and t3.UserID = "& iUserID_lokal &_ " limit 1" oRecord_Kontakt=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord_Kontakt.next() sName1=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(1) sName2=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(2) sName3=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(3) sName4=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(4) sNameKurz=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(5) sLand=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(6) sPLZ=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(7) sOrt=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(8) sStrasse=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(9) sHausnummer=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(10) sTelefon=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(11) sFunktelefon=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(12) sFax=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(13) sEMail=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(14) sUrl=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(15) sBank=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(16) sBIC=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(17) sIBAN=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(18) sGeschaeftsfuehrer=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(19) iOptionInhaber=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(20) sAmtsgericht=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(21) sHRB=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(22) sUmsatzsteuernummer=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(23) sUmsatzsteuerID=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(24) sLogo_URL=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(25) sGrafik_URL=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(26) lLogoHeight=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(27) lLogoWidth=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(28) lGrafikHeight=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(29) lGrafikWidth=oRecord_Kontakt.getLong(30) Feld_fuellen("Preislistenbezeichnung",oRecord_Kontakt.getString(31)) sKundenName1=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(32) sKundenName2=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(33) sKundenName3=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(34) sKundenName4=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(35) SKundenVorname=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(36) sKundenLand=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(37) sKundenPLZ=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(38) sKundenOrt=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(39) sKundenStrasze=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(40) sKundenHausnummer=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(41) iOption1=oRecord_Kontakt.getInt(42) iOption2=oRecord_Kontakt.getInt(43) iOption3=oRecord_Kontakt.getInt(44) iOption4=oRecord_Kontakt.getInt(45) sMaterialaufschlag=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(46) sStundensatz=oRecord_Kontakt.getString(47) Wend
iPrint_Typ=1 iPrint_Logo=1
oStyleFamilies= oDoc.getStyleFamilies() oPageStyles = oStyleFamilies.getByName("PageStyles") oPageStyle_1 = oPageStyles.getByName("First Page") oPageStyle_2 = oPageStyles.getByName("Standard") oTables = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTables") oTables = oDoc.getTextTables
if iPrint_Typ = 0 and iPrint_Logo = 0 then oPageStyle_1.TopMargin = 3200 oPageStyle_2.TopMargin = 3200 oPageStyle_1.LeftMargin = 2000 oPageStyle_2.LeftMargin = 2000 oTables.getByName("Logo1").getRows().removeByIndex(0,1) oTables.getByName("Logo2").getRows().removeByIndex(0,1) else oPageStyle_1.TopMargin = 640 oPageStyle_2.TopMargin = 640
oGraphic = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.GraphicObject") oGraphic.GraphicURL=convertToUrl(sLogo_URL) oGraphic.Height=lLogoHeight oGraphic.Width=lLogoWidth oTable_Logo1 = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") oTable_Logo1 = oTables.getByName("Logo1").getCellByName("A1") oTable_Logo1.insertTextContent(oTable_Logo1, oGraphic, false)
if sGrafik_URL <> "" then oGraphic = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.GraphicObject") oGraphic.GraphicURL=convertToUrl(sGrafik_URL) oGraphic.AnchorType=1 oGraphic.VertOrient=5 oGraphic.Height=lGrafikHeight oGraphic.Width=lGrafikWidth oTable_Logo1= createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") oTable_Logo1= oTables.getByName("Logo1").getCellByName("A1") oCursorKopf1 = oTable_Logo1.createTextCursor() oCursorKopf1.gotoEnd(False) oTable_Logo1.insertTextContent(oCursorKopf1, oGraphic, False) End if
oGraphic = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.GraphicObject") oGraphic.GraphicURL=convertToUrl(sLogo_URL) oGraphic.Height=lLogoHeight oGraphic.Width=lLogoWidth oTable_Logo2 = createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") oTable_Logo2 = oTables.getByName("Logo2").getCellByName("A1") oTable_Logo2.insertTextContent(oTable_Logo2, oGraphic, false)
if sGrafik_URL <> "" then oGraphic = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.GraphicObject") oGraphic.GraphicURL=convertToUrl(sGrafik_URL) oGraphic.AnchorType=1 oGraphic.VertOrient=5 oGraphic.Height=lGrafikHeight oGraphic.Width=lGrafikWidth oTable_Logo2= createunoservice("com.sun.star.text.TextTable") oTable_Logo2= oTables.getByName("Logo2").getCellByName("A1") oCursorKopf2 = oTable_Logo2.createTextCursor() oCursorKopf2.gotoEnd(False) oTable_Logo2.insertTextContent(oCursorKopf2, oGraphic, False) End if End if
sAnschrift_Eigen_1 = sStrasse & " " & sHausnummer & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sPLZ & " " & sOrt sAnschrift_Eigen_2 = sNameKurz & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sStrasse & " " & sHausnummer & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sPLZ & " " & sOrt sAnschrift_Eigen_3 = sName1 & Chr(10) & sName2 & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sStrasse & " " & sHausnummer & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sPLZ & " " & sOrt
if sKundenName1 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("KundenName1",sKundenName1) else Feld_loeschen("KundenName1") End if if sKundenName2 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("KundenName2",sKundenName2) else Feld_loeschen("KundenName2") End if if sKundenName3 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("KundenName3",sKundenName3) else Feld_loeschen("KundenName3") End if if sKundenName4 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("KundenName4",sKundenName4) else Feld_loeschen("KundenName4") End if
if sTelefon <> "" then sKontakt_Bez = "Telefon:" sKontakt = sTelefon End if if sFax <> "" then if sKontakt_Bez <> "" then sKontakt_Bez = sKontakt_Bez & Chr(10) & "Fax:" sKontakt = sKontakt & Chr(10) & sFax else sKontakt_Bez = "Fax:" sKontakt = sFax end if End if if sFunktelefon <> "" then if sKontakt_Bez <> "" then sKontakt_Bez = sKontakt_Bez & Chr(10) & "Mobil:" sKontakt = sKontakt & Chr(10) & sFunktelefon else sKontakt_Bez = "Mobil:" sKontakt = sFunktelefon end if End if if sUrl <> "" then if sKontakt_Bez <> "" then sKontakt_Bez = sKontakt_Bez & Chr(10) & "Url:" sKontakt = sKontakt & Chr(10) & sUrl else sKontakt_Bez = "Url:" sKontakt = sUrl end if End if if sEMail <> "" then if sKontakt_Bez <> "" then sKontakt_Bez = sKontakt_Bez & Chr(10) & "e-Mail:" sKontakt = sKontakt & Chr(10) & sEMail else sKontakt_Bez = "e-Mail:" sKontakt = sEMail end if End if
if sBank <> "" then sBankverbindung_Bez = "Bankverbindung:" & Chr(10) sBankverbindung = sBank & Chr(10) & "IBAN: " & sIBAN & Chr(10) & "BIC: " & sBIC else sBankverbindung_Bez = "" sBankverbindung = "" End if
if sGeschaeftsfuehrer <> "" then if iOptionInhaber = 0 then sGeschaeftsfuehrer_Bez = "Gesch√§ftsf√ºhrer:" & Chr(10) elseif iOptionInhaber = 1 then sGeschaeftsfuehrer_Bez = "Inhaber:" & Chr(10) End if sFirmendaten = sGeschaeftsfuehrer if sUmsatzsteuerID = "" or sUmsatzsteuernummer = "" then sFirmendaten = sFirmendaten & Chr(10) End if else sGeschaeftsfuehrer_Bez = "" sFirmendaten = "" End if if sAmtsgericht <> "" then if sFirmendaten <> "" then sFirmendaten = sFirmendaten & Chr(10) & sAmtsgericht & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sHRB else sFirmendaten = sAmtsgericht & " " & Chr(8226) & " " & sHRB end if End if if sUmsatzsteuerID <> "" then if sFirmendaten <> "" then sFirmendaten = sFirmendaten & Chr(10) & "UmsatzsteuerID: " & sUmsatzsteuerID else sFirmendaten = "UmsatzsteuerID: " & sUmsatzsteuerID end if else sFirmendaten = sFirmendaten & Chr(10) End if if sUmsatzsteuernummer <> "" then if sFirmendaten <> "" then sFirmendaten = sFirmendaten & Chr(10) & "Umsatzsteuernummer: " & sUmsatzsteuernummer else sFirmendaten = "Umsatzsteuernummer: " & sUmsatzsteuernummer end if End if
if sName1 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("Name1",sName1) else Feld_loeschen("Name1") End if if sName2 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("Name2",sName2) else Feld_loeschen("Name2") End if if sName3 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("Name3",sName3) else Feld_loeschen("Name3") End if if sName4 <> "" then Feld_fuellen("Name4",sName4) else Feld_loeschen("Name4") End if
Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_1",sAnschrift_Eigen_1) Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_2",sAnschrift_Eigen_2) Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_3",sAnschrift_Eigen_3) Feld_fuellen("Kontakt_Bez",sKontakt_Bez) Feld_fuellen("Kontakt",sKontakt) Feld_fuellen("Bankverbindung_Bez",sBankverbindung_Bez) Feld_fuellen("Bankverbindung",sBankverbindung) Feld_fuellen("Geschaeftsfuehrer_Bez",sGeschaeftsfuehrer_Bez) Feld_fuellen("Firmendaten",sFirmendaten) oDoc.getTextFields().refresh()
Leistungen.Leistungen(iOption1,iOption2,iOption3,iOption4,sMaterialaufschlag,sStundensatz)
End Sub
